description: This table stores information about film repeats for an imaging order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of repeat/repeat reason combinations associated with an order.

columns.name: NUMBER_REPEATS
columns.description: The number of repeats for a particular repeat reason for the associated order record.

columns.name: REPEAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The repeat reason category ID for a particular number of repeats (NUMBER_REPEATS).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Artifact


Motion


Position


Dark


Light


Overexposed


Underexposed
